select subscription_info.id, subscription_info.user_id, subscription_info.singer_id, subscription_info.create_date, user_info.code as userCode, user_info.name as userName, user_info.images as userImages, singer_info.code as singerCode, singer_info.name as singerName, singer_info.images as singerImages, singer_info.`identity` from subscription_info left join user_info on (user_info.id = subscription_info.user_id) left join singer_info on (singer_info.id = subscription_info.singer_id) where 1 = 1
AND user_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{singerInfo.userName},'%')
AND singer_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{singerInfo.singerName},'%')
order by subscription_info.create_date desc

select subscription_info.id, subscription_info.user_id, subscription_info.singer_id, subscription_info.create_date, user_info.code as userCode, user_info.name as userName, user_info.images as userImages, singer_info.code as singerCode, singer_info.name as singerName, singer_info.images as singerImages, singer_info.`identity` from subscription_info left join user_info on (user_info.id = subscription_info.user_id) left join singer_info on (singer_info.id = subscription_info.singer_id) where 1 = 1 AND subscription_info.user_id = #{userId} order by subscription_info.create_date desc
